questions.text: Research shows that it is helpful to make very specific plans for making positive daily actions for the next two weeks and receive reminders for those plans

To help, I'll ask you to make a statement in the form:
IF situation X is encountered 
 THEN I will do Y

For example, you might say:
IF I am tempted to buy an unhealthy snack 
 THEN I will get a healthy snack.
Be specific!

Let's start with the IF part.
IF I am <fill in the blank with where, when, how, and (maybe) with whom you plan to do positive daily actions>

The statement:
"IF I am {{ii_if}} 
THEN I will {{ii_then}}"
will be your reminder.
If this doesn't look quite right, remember what you were trying to say.
Research shows that keeping a positive self-image is important to making healthy lifestyle changes
Take a bit of time to be self-affirming. This means thinking positively about your past successes, things that are important to you, your values, or what you stand for.

It helps to make tiny plans to do your self-affirmations using statements of the form: 
IF situation X is encountered THEN I will do something self-affirming

Think about the 'IF' part as a specific situation that diminishes your motivation or threatens your self-image.
The 'THEN' part is something specific about you that you feel positive about

Let's start with the IF part.
IF this situation happens < something specific that diminishes my motivation or threatens my self-image>

The statement:
"IF {{sa_if}} 
THEN I will think postively about {{sa_then}}"
will be your reminder.
If this doesn't look quite right, remember what you were trying to say.
When would you like to be reminded about your goals?
When would you like to be reminded about your goals?
When would you like to be reminded about your goals?
When would you like to be reminded about your goals?

Research shows that it is helpful to make very specific plans for eating slowly for the next two weeks and receive reminders for those plans

To help, I'll ask you to make a statement in the form:
IF situation X is encountered 
 THEN I will do Y

For example, you might say:
IF I am eating to fast 
 THEN I will take five more bites.
Be specific!

THEN I will {{ii_then}}"

Research shows that it is helpful to make very specific plans for eating more protein for the next two weeks and receive reminders for those plans

To help, I'll ask you to make a statement in the form:
IF situation X is encountered 
 THEN I will do Y

For example, you might say:
IF there is no protein on my plate 
 THEN I will add a good protein source.
Be specific!

Let's start with the IF part.
IF I am <fill in the blank with where, when, how, and (maybe) with whom you plan to do eat more protean>

THEN I will {{ii_then}}"
will be your reminder.
